metadata.title: NPC to organize free medical camp on 27 July

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jul 25 (APP):National Press Club Islamabad (NPC), in collaboration with Pakistan Islamic Medical Associations (PIMA), would organize free medical camp on 27 July (Sunday) for members and their families. According to a statement issued on Friday, the free medical camp will run from 12 noon to 5 p.m. with free screening for Hepatitis B and C, along with free medical consultations and expert advices. Additionally, free Hepatitis B vaccinations and laboratory tests will also be provided.
